name: Level 1 - Summon Boat
description: Summon Boat is a 1st level spell in the School of Water Magic. The spell may only be cast on the adventure map and next to a shoreline. In order to Summon Boat spell to work, there must be an unoccupied (free) tile to summon the boat. If there are several available tiles, a boat appears at one of the top priority (see the scheme).
